channel.title: Projects on Ryan Sandoval
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Ryan Sandoval

item.title: Imaging System for RPAS - Capstone Project
item.description: Final capstone project for my computer engineering degree. The imaging system can support multiple cameras and can produce video and image output while onboard a remotely piloted aerial system (RPAS).

item.title: Arduino Melodies
item.description: A chip tune player for the Arduino. Program your favourite melodies and hear your Arduino play the music through a buzzer component!

item.title: UAARG Imaging Server
item.description: The University of Alberta Aerial Robotics Group’s (UAARG) imaging server allows the team to perform aerial image processing in a distributed manner. It utilizes Python’s Flask with SQLite3 to create a lightweight server to coordinate and store data from the UAV and processing clients.

item.title: Docker Auto Scaler
item.description: Auto scale a Docker application based on amount of requests. Implemented using the Docker SDK for Python and provides a front-end webpage to monitor statistics.

item.title: Mini Petri Net
item.description: Mini Petri Net simulates a petri net on your browser. Petri nets have a multitude of application in fields like reliability engineering, process control and many more!
